AUTH.INVALID-EMAIL: Should be a valid email address!
AUTH.INVALID-PASSWORD: Should be at least 8 characters long!

AUTHERR.WrongPwMsg: Please try again or reset password.
AUTHERR.EmailExistsMsg: A user with this email already exists. Please change or reset password.
AUTHERR.LoginAfterSignupMsg: Thanks. Your email address has to be validated. A validation link has been sent to your email.
AUTHERR.EmailUnverifiedMsg: Please click on the link in the email sent to you, or reset your password.
AUTHERR.TooManyAttemptsMsg: Due to too many login attempts your account has been temporarily suspended. Please try again later.
AUTHERR.UserDeactivatedMsg: An administrator has to activate your account for
